text: For two days the Greeksmade them pay so dearly...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...the Persian army lost all tastefor battle and were defeated soon after.
title: The Last Samurai

text: - What do you have in mind?- Take away the advantage of their guns.
title: The Last Samurai

text: They're overconfident. We'll use that.Lure them close.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Close enough for a sword.
title: The Last Samurai

text: You believe...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...a man can change his destiny?
title: The Last Samurai

text: I think a man does what he can...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...until his destiny is revealed to him.
title: The Last Samurai

text: This will be the last entryin this journal.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I've tried to give a true accountingof what I have seen, what I have done.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I do not presume to understandthe course of my life.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I know I am gratefulto have partaken of all this...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...even if for a moment.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Algren-san, will you come with me?
title: The Last Samurai

text: If you wear this armor,it will honor us.
title: The Last Samurai

text: You will need this.
title: The Last Samurai

text: What does it say?
title: The Last Samurai

text: "I belong to the warrior in whomthe old ways have joined the new. "
title: The Last Samurai

text: Good God.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Sir, the Imperial Army of Japandemands your surrender.
title: The Last Samurai

text: If you lay down your arms,you will not be harmed.
title: The Last Samurai

text: This is not possible,as Mr. Omura knows.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Captain Algren.
title: The Last Samurai

text: We will show you no quarter.
title: The Last Samurai

text: You ride against us,and you are the same as them.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I'll look for you on the field.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Captain Algren.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Mr. Graham.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Perhaps you can use thesefor your book.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Yes, I will. Captain.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Godspeed.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Mr. Graham.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Well they won't surrender.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Are we ready?
title: The Last Samurai

text: Get into your positions!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Commence firing!
title: The Last Samurai

text: - They're covering their retreat.- You see?
title: The Last Samurai

text: Even the mighty Samuraicannot stand up to the howitzers.
title: The Last Samurai

text: - Signal the attack.- I advise sending in skirmishers first.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Nonsense! Full attack!
title: The Last Samurai

text: They're coming.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Wait for the volley.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Second volley.
title: The Last Samurai

text: - What on earth?- What is happening?
title: The Last Samurai

text: - The attack has been stopped.- Send in the rest of the regiment.
title: The Last Samurai

text: What happened to the warriorsat Thermopylae?
title: The Last Samurai

text: Dead to the last man.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Algren-san!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Son of a bitch thinks he can win.
title: The Last Samurai

text: They'll bring two more regimentsup here soon.
title: The Last Samurai

text: We won't be able to stop them again.
title: The Last Samurai

text: You do not have to die here.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I should have diedso many times before.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Now, you live again.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Yes.
title: The Last Samurai

text: It was not your time.
title: The Last Samurai

text: It's not over.
title: The Last Samurai

text: What is this?
title: The Last Samurai

text: Cannon, prepare to fire!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Prepare to fire!
title: The Last Samurai

text: - This is madness. He's going to attack?- Yes.
title: The Last Samurai

text: He's defeated!He must accept his shame!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Kill him. All of them.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Now!
title: The Last Samurai

text: My horse!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Fire!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Ready!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Aim!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Fire!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Fire at will!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Bring up the new guns!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Prepare the new guns!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Fire!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Backward!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Quickly! Quickly!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Fire!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Stop firing!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Idiots, keep on firing!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Stop firing! Stop!
title: The Last Samurai

text: No.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Shoot! Kill Katsumoto!Kill the American!
title: The Last Samurai

text: You have your honor again.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Let me die with mine.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Help me up.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Are you ready?
title: The Last Samurai

text: I will miss our conversations.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Perfect.
title: The Last Samurai

text: They are all...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...perfect.
title: The Last Samurai

text: On behalf of the United Statesof America...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...the signing of this treaty will usher inan era of unprecedented prosperity...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...and cooperation betweenour two great nations.
title: The Last Samurai

text: On behalf of the Emperor...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...we are pleased to havesuccessfully concluded this...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...negotiation.
title: The Last Samurai

text: He is here?
title: The Last Samurai

text: Highness, if we could just concludethe matter at hand....
title: The Last Samurai

text: This is Katsumoto's sword.
title: The Last Samurai

text: He would have wanted you to have it...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...that the strength of the Samuraibe with you always.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Enlightened One,we all weep for Katsumoto, but-
title: The Last Samurai

text: He hoped...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...with his last breath...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...that you would remember theancestors who held this sword...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...and what they died for.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Your Highness....
title: The Last Samurai

text: You were with him...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...at the end?
title: The Last Samurai

text: Emperor, this man fought against you!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Your Highness...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...if you believe me to be your enemy,command me...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...and I will gladly take my life.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I have dreamed of a unified Japan...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...of a country strongand independent and modern.
title: The Last Samurai

text: And now we have railroadsand cannon, Western clothing.
title: The Last Samurai

text: But...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...we cannot forget who we are...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...or where we come from.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Ambassador Swanbeck...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...I have concluded that your treaty...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...is not in the best interestof my people.
title: The Last Samurai

text: - Sir, if I may-- So sorry...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...but you may not.
title: The Last Samurai

text: This is an outrage!
title: The Last Samurai

text: Enlightened One,we should discuss this-
title: The Last Samurai

text: Omura...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...you have done quite enough.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Everything I have done,I have done for my country.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Then you will not mindwhen I seize your family's assets...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...and present themas my gift to the people.
title: The Last Samurai

text: You disgrace me.
title: The Last Samurai

text: If your shame is too unbearable...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...I offer you this sword.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Tell me how he died.
title: The Last Samurai

text: I will tell you how he lived.
title: The Last Samurai

text: And so the daysof the Samurai had ended.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Nations, like men, it is sometimes said,have their own destiny.
title: The Last Samurai

text: As for the American captain...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...no one knows what became of him.
title: The Last Samurai

text: Some say that he died of his wounds...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...others, that he returnedto his own country.
title: The Last Samurai

text: But I like to think...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...he may have at last foundsome small measure of peace...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...that we all seek...
title: The Last Samurai

text: ...and few of us ever find.
title: The Last Samurai
